Since 2016

Looking for an exceptional barbershop experience?

Welcome to El Teca Barbershop! Your passport to the realm of impeccable style and the home to the finest fades in town.

Our Expert Services:

  • Gray Coverage and Premium Beard Trims
  • Detailed Brow Waxing and Blade Shaping
  • Distinctive Hair Tattoos
  • Hydrating and Exfoliating Facials
  • Personalized Styling Consultation

Discover the El Teca experience today! We can't wait to show you what we're capable of. With our unwavering commitment to quality craftsmanship, meticulous attention to detail, and resolute dedication to your satisfaction, we guarantee a look you'll love. At El Teca, every cut is a work of art and every client becomes a testament to our love for this craft.

Learn More About Us
Our Portfolio

Some Memorable Shots from our Gallery

We take pride in our work and we love to show it off. Here are some of our favorite cuts and styles from our gallery.

Pricing

All Hair Services

  • Regular Haircut / Corte de Cabello $35

    Best known for our fades. Whether you’re looking for a tapered design or a fade haircut, back drop fade, skin fade, blow out's , flat tops. Our barbers have all the skills and tools.

  • Eye Brow Wax / Alineado de Ceja con Wax $15

    A great way to get your eyebrows on point. We use wax to shape your eyebrows and make them look clean and sharp.

  • Straight Razor Shave & Beard Tint / Tinte Para Barba y Alineado $75

    Classic straight razor shave with hot towel and beard tint. We use a straight razor to give you a clean shave with hot towel to open up your pores. We also offer a tasteful tint to give your beard a fuller look.

  • Hair Cut & Beard Service / Corte de Cabello con Barba $65

    Standard fare haircut with beard service. We offer a variety of beard services including trim, line up, and beard shaping. Fade out!

  • Hair Design Art & HairCut / Corte de Cabello con Diseño $55

    This includes our specialty "hair tattoo" service. Popular patterns can be found in our gallery. We also offer custom designs; bring in a picture and we'll make it happen.

  • Eye Brows With Razor / Alineado de Ceja con Navaja $7

    A quick and professional eyebrow lineup completed with a straight razor.

  • Post Shave Mask / Mascarilla Después del Afeitado $30

    An exfoliating face mask for smoother, healthier looking skin after your shave. It makes a big difference!

  • Hydrating & Cleansing Facial $70

    For ultimate skin rejuvenation. Enjoy a thorough cleanse, followed by a tailored hydrating mask, leaving your skin refreshed and glowing.

  • Hair Cuts For Men (Extra Long) / Corte de Pelo Largo Para Hombres $45

    Long-haired cuts, tailored to your desired look. Step into sophistication and leave with a refined appearance that showcases your unique personality.

  • Straight-razor Shave / Razurado de Barba con Navaja $30

    Careful shave and grooming service for your beard, resulting in a clean and polished look.

  • Wash & Style / Lavado y Cepillado $75+

    Shampoo, conditioner, as well as a hydrating hair mask and styling.

Experience
the Best in Barbering

We've loved serving the Big Lake area and hope to continue to do so for years to come. We're always looking for new clients and would love to have you join the El Teca family. Come in and see what we're all about!
